flawed_nl_solution:
After this week, Michelangelo will have 28-12=<<28-12=16>>16 more ceilings to paint.
Next week, Michelangelo will paint 12/4=<<12/4=3>>3 ceilings.
Michelangelo will have 16-3=<<16-3=15>>15 more ceilings to paint.
#### 15

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 15. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
